description: This Flutter widget defines the 'NoteListScreen' which displays a list of notes, supports searching, and navigation to note details or note creation/editing screens.

classes.name: NoteListScreen
classes.description: Main screen widget displaying list of notes with search and navigation capabilities.

classes.name: _NoteListScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the logic and UI for 'NoteListScreen'.

methods.name: _loadNotes
methods.description: Fetches notes from the service, optionally filtered by search term.

methods.name: _onSearchChanged
methods.description: Updates search term and reloads notes when search input changes.

methods.name: _goToDetail
methods.description: Navigates to the note detail screen for a selected note.

methods.name: _goToCreate
methods.description: Navigates to the note creation/edit screen.
